thread.title: Tillerson Met With Captive American Pastor During Visit To Turkey
thread.title_full: Tillerson Met With Captive American Pastor During Visit To Turkey

author: Jack Davis
title: Tillerson Met With Captive American Pastor During Visit To Turkey
text:
Tillerson Met With Captive American Pastor During Visit To Turkey "I plead with my government -- with the Trump administration ..." by Jack Davis March 31, 2017 at 7:50am Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print Advertisement - story continues below 
Secretary of State Rex Tillerson on Thursday met in Ankara, Turkey, with the wife of an American pastor who has been in jail since last fall on terrorism charges. 
North Carolina native Norine Brunson would not divulge what took place at the meeting, which came unexpectedly after she flew to Turkey even though she had been told Tillerson would not be meeting with her. 
“On Monday, Andrew told me he felt the Lord had said I would meet with Sec of State Tillerson. On Tuesday, I was told by the embassy and another senator that the meeting would NOT happen. I decided to come to Ankara anyway and arrived last night. I met with another significant person in the State Department early afternoon, then late afternoon was told the Secretary would meet with me,” Norine Brunson wrote on Facebook Thursday. Advertisement - story continues below
